article.title: EOIR to Support Constant Hawk-Afghanistan
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: EOIR Technologies Incorporated, Fredericksburg, Virginia, was awarded an $83,750,574 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for the maintenance and logistics support for the Constant Hawk-Afghanistan and light detection and ranging aircraft. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Aberdeen Proving Ground, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
